```{r include=FALSE} 
knitr::opts_chunk$set(options(scipen = 999))
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

> Check by computation that:
>
> (a) $C(7, 2) = C(7, 5)$

$$\binom{7}{2} = \frac{7 \cdot 6}{2 \cdot 1} = 21$$
$$\binom{7}{5} = \frac{7 \cdot 6 \cdot 5 \cdot 4 \cdot 3}{5 \cdot 4 \cdot 3 \cdot 2 \cdot 1} = 21$$

> (b) $C(6, 4) = C(6, 2)$

$$\binom{6}{4} = \frac{6 \cdot 5 \cdot 4 \cdot 3}{4 \cdot 3 \cdot 2 \cdot 1} = 15$$
$$\binom{6}{2} = \frac{6 \cdot 5}{2 \cdot 1} = 15$$
